QuestData.Title: The Life Spring
QuestData.Description: So we came here cause we needed a weapon we saw the botani using.$b$bHansel grabbed the artifact an' Scorchbrow an' I were supposed to grab the special water the thing runs on.$b$bWe didn't know that water so full of life forms an elemental.$b$bIf ya mosey up to the cauldron at the base of that fancy lookin' ancient artifact in Evermorn Springs, you'll be findin' this beast. If ya can kill it and get its water, we can use it when we get the rest of the artifact.
QuestData.CompletionText: Now I see why some become Rangari. This is exciting.
QuestData.RewardText: You are carrying something of great power on you. I could feel it as you approached.
